summary: Adds Ghost Rider as a follower outside Riverwood with a spare set of Armour and Sword.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a unique follower to Skyrim, based on the Marvel character, Johnny Blaze, Ghost Rider, The Spirit Of Vengeance, The Rider!

This is for Male Only.

You'll find him outside Riverwood. He will level with the player and is a spellsword, he also uses fire spells and has his own perks.

Furthermore, it adds an second set of armour and sword.

***************************************************
The Armour:
Based around the Dragonscale Cuirass, Son's Of Talos Gauntlets and Boots retextured with the black and silver scheme of Ghost Rider.The Skull is by newermind43 so big thank you to him. It's unenchanted, and can only be crafted under the leather section of the Sky Forge, and tempered as usual at the workbench. Stat-wise it's a little stronger than the mentioned armours.
Note the set is standalone, and not a replacer. Although it's based Ghost Rider of Marvel, i've attempted to make it look more armor based, more in keeping with Skyrim. It's about as lore-friendly as you can get.

The Weapon - Sword:
Based on the Daedric Sword it's enchanted with Fire, and can only be crafted under the daedric section of the Sky Forge, and tempered as usual at the sharpening wheel. Stat-wise it's a little stronger than Daedric Sword.
Note is is standalone, and not a replacer.

**************************************************
Compatibility & Troubleshooting

The armour should not conflict with anything else.
**************************************************

Installation:
Simply extract the archive into the Skyrim folder, so the .esp, textures folder, and meshes folder all land into your skyrim/data directory.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
